story: Mohammed Hussien shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Windows Phone is dead
caption: theverge.com
description: Windows Phone started off life as a promising alternative to Android and iOS five years ago. Microsoft positioned its range of Windows Phone 7 handsets as the true third mobile ecosystem, but it's...

data.message: The Verge always makes  black propaganda to any competitor to Apple, you can check the site to see how much Apple is being obsessed, and count how many subconscious mind controlling for Apple.

This article is bs with all due respect to op. There isn't anything official from the vendor saying they would stop it. Having a small market share doesn't say that the company is going to drop it. Take Opera browser in our industry as in example since day one I don't remember that opera ever had more than 7-10% of Market share and yet after more than 15 years it's still alive. I believe with the new direction Microsoft is taking Windows phone is going to evolve and mature and become a strong competitor. Let's not forget surface and how it made other tablets look like a joke. Only time will judge
